languages.text: "Ранен... я... употребил бы другое выражение. Вроде... "замучан и изувечен". А вам когда-нибудь... выжигали глаза? Мне — впервые... вынужден признать — не могу рекомендовать эту процедуру... она..." {n}— молодой человек то ли пытается шутить, то ли бредит от боли.{/n}

"'Wounded'... I... would have phrased it altogether differently... 'Tortured and maimed,' perhaps... Have you ever... had your eyes burned out? This was my first time... I cannot say I recommend the procedure... It..." {n}He is either trying to make light of the situation or growing delirious from the pain.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ранен... я... употребил бы другое выражение. Вроде... "замучан и изувечен". А вам когда-нибудь... выжигали глаза? Мне — впервые... вынужден признать — не могу рекомендовать эту процедуру... она..." {n}— молодой человек то ли пытается шутить, то ли бредит от боли.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "'Wounded'... I... would have used a different expression. Like... 'tortured and maimed'... Have you ever... had your eyes burned out? This is my first time... I cannot say I recommend this procedure... it..." {n}He is either trying to make light of the situation or growing delirious from the pain.{/n}

"'Wounded'... I... would have used a different expression. Like... 'tortured and maimed'... Have you ever... had your eyes burned out? This is my first time... I cannot say I recommend this procedure... It..." {n}He is either trying to make light of the situation or growing delirious from the pain.{/n}

I cannot say I recommend the procedure... It..." {n}He is either trying to make light of the situation or growing delirious from the pain.{/n}

I cannot say I recommend the procedure... It..." {n}He is either trying to make light of the situation or growing delirious from the pain.{/n}

"'Wounded'... I... would have phrased it altogether differently... 'Tortured and maimed,' perhaps... Have you ever... had your eyes burned out? This was my first time... I cannot say I recommend the procedure... It..." {n}He is either trying to make light of the situation or growing delirious from the pain.{/n}

languages.text: “‘受伤’……我……可能会用别的词来描述这种状况……‘遭到折磨’或‘受到残害’，或许吧……您有没有……被别人烧瞎过眼睛？这是我第一次经历……我恐怕不怎么推荐这种经历……它真是……”{n}他要么是想有意轻描淡写，要么是因为疼痛变得神志不清。{/n}
languages.original_text: "'Wounded'... I... would have phrased it altogether differently... 'Tortured and maimed,' perhaps... Have you ever... had your eyes burned out? This was my first time... I cannot say I recommend the procedure... It..." {n}He is either trying to make light of the situation or growing delirious from the pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “‘受伤’……我……可能会用别的词来描述这种状况……‘遭到折磨’或‘受到残害’，或许吧……您有没有……被别人烧瞎过眼睛？这是我第一次经历……我恐怕不怎么推荐这种经历……它真是……”{n}他要么是想有意轻描淡写，要么是因为疼痛变得神志不清。{/n}

languages.text: 「『傷を負っている』…それは…適切な言い方ではないな。『拷問され、深手を負っている』と言うのが正確だ。あなたは…目を焼かれたことはあるか？俺は初めてだったよ。オススメはできないがね…」{n}彼は少しでも気を楽にしようとしているのか、あるいは痛みで錯乱しているかのどちらかのようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "'Wounded'... I... would have phrased it altogether differently... 'Tortured and maimed,' perhaps... Have you ever... had your eyes burned out? This was my first time... I cannot say I recommend the procedure... It..." {n}He is either trying to make light of the situation or growing delirious from the pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「負傷している…それは…適切な言い回しではありません…「拷問され、傷つけられた」というのが正しいでしょう…あなたは…目を焼かれたことはありますか？私は初めてでした…オススメはできませんがね…」{n}彼は少しでも気を楽にしようとしているのか、あるいは痛みで錯乱しているかのどちらかのようだ。{/n}
「『傷を負っている』…それは…適切な言い方ではないな。『拷問され、深手を負っている』と言うのが正確だ。あなたは…目を焼かれたことはあるか？俺は初めてだったよ。オススメはできないがね…」{n}彼は少しでも気を楽にしようとしているのか、あるいは痛みで錯乱しているかのどちらかのようだ。{/n}

languages.text: "'Verwundet' ... Ich ... hätte es völlig anders formuliert ... 'Gefoltert und verstümmelt' vielleicht ... Wurden Euch schon jemals ... die Augen ausgebrannt? Bei mir war's das erste Mal ... Ich würde die Prozedur nicht unbedingt empfehlen ... Sie ..." {n}Entweder versucht er, durch Humor von der Lage abzulenken, oder der Schmerz lässt ihn wahnhaft werden.{/n}
languages.original_text: "'Wounded'... I... would have phrased it altogether differently... 'Tortured and maimed,' perhaps... Have you ever... had your eyes burned out? This was my first time... I cannot say I recommend the procedure... It..." {n}He is either trying to make light of the situation or growing delirious from the pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "'Verwundet' ... Ich ... hätte es völlig anders formuliert ... 'Gefoltert und verstümmelt' vielleicht ... Wurden Euch schon jemals ... die Augen ausgebrannt? Bei mir war's das erste Mal ... Ich würde die Prozedur nicht unbedingt empfehlen ... Sie ..." {n}Entweder versucht er, durch Humor von der Lage abzulenken, oder der Schmerz lässt ihn wahnhaft werden.{/n}

languages.text: « "Blessé"... Je... l'aurais formulé tout autrement... "Torturé et mutilé", peut-être... Vous a-t-on déjà... brûlé les yeux ? C'était une première pour moi... Je ne peux pas dire que je recommande la procédure... C'est... » {n}Soit Evayne essaie de faire bonne figure en dépit de la situation, soit il délire sous l'effet de la douleur.{/n}
languages.original_text: "'Wounded'... I... would have phrased it altogether differently... 'Tortured and maimed,' perhaps... Have you ever... had your eyes burned out? This was my first time... I cannot say I recommend the procedure... It..." {n}He is either trying to make light of the situation or growing delirious from the pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « "Blessé"... Je... l'aurais formulé tout autrement... "Torturé et mutilé", peut-être... Vous a-t-on déjà... brûlé les yeux ? C'était une première pour moi... Je ne peux pas dire que je recommande la procédure... C'est... » {n}Soit Evayne essaie de faire bonne figure en dépit de la situation, soit il délire sous l'effet de la douleur.{/n}

languages.text: «"Herido"... Yo... Lo expresaría de otro modo, la verdad... Tal vez "torturado y mutilado" ... ¿Alguna vez le han... quemado los ojos? Es la primera vez para mí... No recomiendo el procedimiento... Es...». {n}Intenta quitar hierro al asunto, aunque es posible que esté delirando por el dolor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "'Wounded'... I... would have phrased it altogether differently... 'Tortured and maimed,' perhaps... Have you ever... had your eyes burned out? This was my first time... I cannot say I recommend the procedure... It..." {n}He is either trying to make light of the situation or growing delirious from the pain.{/n}

No recomiendo el procedimiento... Es...» {n}Intenta quitar hierro al asunto, aunque es posible que esté delirando por el dolor.{/n}

languages.text: "'Yaralı' mı? Ben... Böyle betimlemezdim durumumu. 'İşkence görmüş ve sakat bırakılmış' belki. Sizin hiç... Gözleriniz dağlandı mı? İlk defa yaptırıyorum. İşlemi tavsiye ettiğimi söyleyemem. Bu..." {n}Ya durumu hafifletmeye çalışıyor ya da acıdan sayıklıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "'Wounded'... I... would have phrased it altogether differently... 'Tortured and maimed,' perhaps... Have you ever... had your eyes burned out? This was my first time... I cannot say I recommend the procedure... It..." {n}He is either trying to make light of the situation or growing delirious from the pain.{/n}
